product_name: Polar CS500+ Wireless Bike Computer with Heart Rate Monitor and Cadence Sensor
long_description: With a heart-rate monitor and cadence sensor to improve performance, the CS500+ Wireless bike computer features a big, user-friendly interface to tell you how hard to ride and your average cadence.
short_description: With a heart-rate monitor and cadence sensor to improve performance, the CS500+ Wireless bike computer features a big, user-friendly interface to tell you how hard to ride and your average cadence.
